forum.content:
相對於拉薩，充滿著色彩的日喀則。

我背著背包沿著這個舊城市行走，眼裡看到居民，住家與純粹的色彩。

在此地的許多人生活在貧窮線之下，但他們的心靈絕不貧窮，因為信仰。在曼遊期間，我遇見了這對姐弟。他們成了我腦海中，日喀則的風景。

With the sun at its zenith we had just arrived in Shigatse which is another core city, by comparison with Lhasa, of Tibet. It was a delicate city full of colors that almost all houses, even every single wall, were painted vividly (for, you see, the wall with Tibetan scripts neighboring the children was beautifully painted.) Taking a random walk with my backpack around this old city, every sight entered my eyes was quite simple and natural that would impress you deeply.
Most inhabitants of the region lacked for life matters living below the poverty line. However, it should be extremely different from what in their minds on account of their faith. The natives, most of them were pious Buddhists, were faithful to their lives, and thus I believe they were much richer than us in a spiritual sort of way.
After turning a corner, suddenly I came upon two siblings who were wandering in the streets near Tashilhunpo Monastery. The little three-year-old girl carried her one-year-old brother on her back.
forum.title: 西藏 日喀則
